mainText:
May the creator receive him with open arms close to him.

A truly a humble, intelligent, all outgiving magnificent human being, With his true care for better, he inspire the whole world to a better stage i
n all aspect of live.

His memory will be perpetuated by what he has done, and everything was done f
or the better of the human race, and not his. A true excellence in all senses.

We must thanks to God for let us had Steve Jobs for the time we had him, that was blessing!!!
header: My condolence to Steve Jobs family
author: Charlie
